portrait.alt: Master Craftsman Torvin at his workbench

message:
Ah, a new face at the Workshop! I'm Torvin, master craftsman.

This is where we turn raw materials into useful items. Not as fancy as what you make in the Foundry, but just as important!

Bring me wood, stone, or metal, and I'll help you craft tools and equipment for your explorers. Every great adventure starts with good preparation.
